definitions.title: n. pr. gent. coll.
definitions.body: steppe-dwellers of N. Arabia (Wetzst:Zvölkerpsych. vii. 463 f.; extended later (so Herod:ii. 11 etc.) to whole peninsula, cf. Ar. garaba the Arabs, Bedúwy the people, Doughty:Arab. Deserta, i. 224; Sab. [[ערבן]], [[ערב]], [[אערב]] CIS:iv. p. 123, As. Aribu, Arubu, Arabi, people in N. Arabia, Dl:Pa 295 f. 304 f. COT:Je 25, 24; also Urbi Dl:Pa 305 f. of nomad ‘Arab’ tribes);—[[הַשּׁׂכְנִים בַּמִּדְבָּר]] ´[[מַלְכֵי ע]] Je 25:24 (v. 1. [[עֵרֶב]]), 2Ch 9:14 + ‖ 1Ki 10:15 (v. id.); ´[[ע]] also Ez Eze 27:21 + Eze 30:5 (v. id.); v. esp. Nö:Arabia in Ency. Bib.
